class.name: Modifier
class.brief_description: Simple Object that works with [GameObject]s to change [ModifiedIntValue] and [ModifiedFloatValue]
class.description: The best way to create and initialize a [Modifier] is to use the static [method create] method. [Modifier] is RefCounted and will automatically clean itself up when no reference is being hold anymore (so when the Object that has the only instance goes out of scope or the variable is set to null)

method.name: allowCategories
method.description: This modifier will only apply the modification when at least one of the categories matches with the categories in the [ModifiedIntValue] or [ModifiedFloatValue].

method.name: create
method.description: Creates a Modifier and initializes it, registering itself with the [param gameObject]

method.name: getAdditiveMod
method.description: Simply returns the value that was set with [method setAdditiveMod]

method.name: getMultiplierMod
method.description: Simply returns the value that was set with [method setMultiplierMod]

method.name: getName
method.description: [method getName] is used by the statistics module to show human readable names.

method.name: init
method.description: Only use when the [Modifier] wasn't created with the [method create] method (prefer to use create!).

method.name: setAdditiveMod
method.description: When the [param additiveMod] is not 0, it will be added to the base value before multiplication.

method.name: setMultiplierMod
method.description: When the [param multiplierMod] is not 0, all the multiplier for this modifier type will be added together and then multiplied with the base value plus all the additive modifier.

method.name: setName
method.description: This should be called when this modifier type is shown in any GUI.
